title: Building for Sale in Katugasthota
details:
Commercial building for sale in Katugasthota

Facing a Katugasthota Kurunagala main road

The building has 4 floors with approximately 1600 square feet in total

Land extent – 9.8 perches

Ideal for commercial purposes

Expecting Price: Rs 65 Million (Negotiable)

Please call for more information
